name: nodejs-pro-tasks
description: 1. Run REPL mode and split a word 'node' after that reverse the word to edon via reduce method.   >Solution   ```   (node.split('').reduce((prev, curr, index, arr) => prev + arr[arr.length - index - 1], '' ))   ``` 2. Make a calculator 3. Make a calculator which works with EventEmmiter
